website_summaries.verdict: Another art tablet option with a good-sized drawing area that is well-made and suitable for beginners.
pros: Lightweight and sleek, this tablet offers a generous creative area, 10" x 6", with pen accuracy at 2040 levels of sensitivity
Tablet has 3-button mouse commands and 8 shortcut keys for ease and efficiency
High screen resolution and fast refresh (230 rps) make you feel like you're working on paper
Stylus is ergonomically designed for comfort
cons: Some had problems installing drivers, and there may be compatibility issues with Windows 10
Battery needs to be recharged with ongoing use

customer_reviews.title: Pen Pressure doesn't work in Photoshop. No tilt functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Should have know better, these cheap tablets always have the same problems. Driver issues were a headache but even once I got those (kind of) sorted out, the tablet is basically useless. Pen pressure doesn't work in Photoshop, and above, the seller lies and says that this tablet has tilt functionality. It does not. If all you want is a basic, decently sized tablet, then go for it. Otherwise steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for beginner & novice users.
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! and I really mean that. comes with stylus feels natural and comfortable even with large hands. I like the travel pouch/bag it comes with perfect material for protecting this tablet, although I will probably seldom use it since I don't travel much.
customer_reviews.author: StickyProjectile

customer_reviews.title: fail dont buy
customer_reviews.text: sucks! anyone wants mine. I will sale for half price!
customer_reviews.author: Tooeasymode

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Beginner Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the tablet for 5 months now, and it works great. The only flaw I’ve found is that the surface does scratch pretty easily, but that doesn’t effect your drawing at all. The setup was really easy, and it works great with Krita. The pen is light, and the tablet is great quality. I am hoping to buy a parblo monitor tablet soon.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stump

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Good
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet for the price, I used it on Fusion365 and is more than enoug to me.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon M.

customer_reviews.title: Not Windows compatible
customer_reviews.text: Was not compatible with Microsoft windows. Driver could not be installed so the tablet would not operate properly. This appears to be a common issue. Item had to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley S.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful tablet
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this, she is new to drawing and is having a great time with this superb tool.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Best Tool I've purchased for remote teaching!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool for virtual blackboards (Ziteboard is my new fave) and note-taking. Quick to set up with my PC, and haven't had any issues with the pen running out of charge. I haven't been able to figure out how to set the buttons on the pad itself for anything useful, but otherwise all functions are solid.
customer_reviews.author: SciTeach3

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this for her birthday. She likes it a lot. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: For drawing and osu!
customer_reviews.text: Very great! It's a bit hard to adjust to digitally drawing especially if you're used to drawing on paper (which isn't at all the fault of the tablet) but once you keep practicing you get used to it. In terms of gaming, it works amazingly for games like osu!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: it's not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Decent tablet. Pen is fragile! If you drop it, expect to buy another one. Although at $11 for a replacement pen, it's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wood

customer_reviews.title: Disc problems
customer_reviews.text: The disc download wasnt up to date at all. You have to download from website or it wont work as intended
customer_reviews.author: Branden vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my little sister as a Christmas gift. She loves it she uses it every time she draws. It made her happy she says it’s pretty good the connection can be a little slow tho but it usually catches up.
customer_reviews.author: DeVaugn

customer_reviews.title: Product stops working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Pressure sensitivity stopped working, and the cursor jitters a very frequently
customer_reviews.author: Chong Kim

customer_reviews.title: Hard to set up
customer_reviews.text: I like it at first but then it would not turn on when it was with my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Noemy Zermeno

customer_reviews.title: I really like the little case it came with however the button ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get the gloves unfortunately (and it really seems to grab the oils from your hands).. I really like the little case it came with however the button on it broke almost immediately, and there is no spot in the case I feel safe to put the pen for travel (pockets for both cords separate from tablet). would have gotten 5/5 if not for these things. Setup/installation wasn't difficult on my old laptop (updated to windows 10) The tablet has a larger drawing area than I was expecting. It's is thin,and lightweight. It's a comfortable feel when drawing on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ember

customer_reviews.title: Update software drivers before using.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected after you get the most recent updates. Nothing special but great for me a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels great, no lag, great sensitivity, sexy carrier. Probably my best purchase on amazon. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang

customer_reviews.title: not capabilities with laptop for use!
customer_reviews.text: ordered for a christmas present and it didnt have capabilities to work in the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Concetta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is a very good tablet and brings every thing that it says.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A few problems with the installer but everythins was ok.
customer_reviews.author: omar ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 12 year old son. As soon as we received it, he set it up and started drawing with it. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Olds1368

customer_reviews.title: Included software won't completely download/crashing.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting one of these for years! I finally decided to go for it. At the moment I am waiting for Parblo support to respond to me. The software will not completely download. I can use the pen but cannot set up any buttons or controls. I am terribly disappointed in the issue. I was hoping to spend the next couple of days getting acquainted with this new tool for my graphic design. I am hoping to report back here soon with the solution.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Vermillion

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy - quality is sorely lacking. Cord didn't even work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Learning curve required
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these for some time now. Glad I did. I had some trouble installing software. My antivirus wasn't shutting down. Got it fixed and love it. It definitely has a learning curve. Quite different then paper. It has helped me immensely on my motorcycle designing, and I'm only a week in. Strange as heck watching a screen and drawing on a pad. It takes your ability to watch your hand away from you, yet awesome results.
customer_reviews.author: The Kilted Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This thing i awesome can i cant get enough of it i have been using it everyday since i got it, it has help me out greatly with my artwork and to anyone who is thinking about buying one of these i say go for it is worth it
customer_reviews.author: Dark-Cat

customer_reviews.title: Can't pass this up
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my budding artist. OMG the love being had for this tablet. Its amazing and does so much more than we thought. Its worth every penny and its easy to figure out and use....absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Koree

customer_reviews.title: Color us HAPPY!  Amazing little tablet!
customer_reviews.text: Easily setup! Granddaughter had it mastered within an hour! Amazing what this little tablet allows her to do with her artwork! Highly recommend - great produce for the price!
customer_reviews.author: froggie

customer_reviews.title: Bought for daughter.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 12 year old daughter and she loves it! Was easy for her to set up and was surprised at how affordable it was.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product is so difficult to set up . Still can’t use ur what a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Asheda bandhu

customer_reviews.title: Well priced and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves it. If you're an artist or know one then you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: TheDarkSeraph

customer_reviews.title: I haven’t had a chance to use it yet but the quality looks great
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had a chance to use it yet but the quality looks great
customer_reviews.author: Alan Smithey

customer_reviews.title: pedido incompleto
customer_reviews.text: no llego forro de tableta , tampoco llego guante, on order no 1x Wool Felt Liner Bag, 1x Anti-fouling Glove
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Rojas Zamorano

customer_reviews.title: Versatility my dude
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves it, it's easy to use and very versatile. She is now able to draw whatever she wants, and I can throw my life away while playing osu. Good stuff
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it tutoring students online. NO ISSUES at all and works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Stvrhoades

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it's fine for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: glitchy. Didn't interface well with Windows 10. There was some jitter and lag to the pen. I'm sure it's fine for a beginner, but not the best choice for a professional tool.
customer_reviews.author: Rites of Romance Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Well pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected in a medium size pen tablet. Very good quality, and would rate it equal to or better than the Huion or Urge models. The carry sleeve and glove is a value plus.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Bad drivers
customer_reviews.text: It worked very well and the website was easily accessible to download new drivers. But ultimately, the drivers had failed too many times when using a drawing application.
customer_reviews.author: scott

product_meta.title: Parblo A610 Graphic Drawing Tablet with 2048 Levels Pressure Pen, Carry Bag, Drawing Tablet Glove, 10" x 6" Drawing Tablet for Digital Art Works
feature_bullets: The Parblo A610 Drawing Tablet with 10" x 6" active area allows you to release your inspiration on enough space.
Equipped with 3-button mouse commands and 8 shortcut keys makes it easier to operation and saving more time.
2040 levels pressure sensitivity pen enables the panel to feel your pressure precisely, thick or thin? Dark or light? Sparse or dense, it’s all depends on your hand.
5080LPI resolution, 230 RPS bring you smooth using experience, similar to a thin paper. The ergonomic digital stylus makes you feel like drawing by a pencil.

It’s slim, sleek and super lightweight panel with compact design and delicate craftsmanship. This graphic drawing tablet can be used for drawing painting, sketching, handwriting, marking, signature, etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars101 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
